resource.name: 1-NG-Bundle: Hospital to HMO (Claim Submission)
resource.description: Bundle used by a healthcare provider (hospital) to submit a claim to an HMO for services rendered.

resource.name: 2-NG-Bundle: HMO to Insurer
resource.description: Bundle representing communication from HMO to Insurance Organization for claim adjudication or reporting.

resource.name: 3-NG-Bundle: Patient to Hospital
resource.description: Bundle representing patient registration and care events with a hospital. Used for service documentation, referrals, or internal claim preparation.

resource.name: 4-NG-Bundle: Patient to Insurer
resource.description: Bundle representing patient-initiated interaction with insurer, such as eligibility verification or coverage inquiry.

resource.name: Example: HMO to Insurer Claim Submission Bundle
resource.description: An example bundle from an HMO to an insurer containing submitted claims and associated resources.

resource.name: Example: Hospital to HMO Claim Bundle
resource.description: An example bundle submitted from a hospital to an HMO for reimbursement.

resource.name: Example: Patient to Hospital Interaction Bundle
resource.description: An example bundle representing a patient registration and clinical encounter at a hospital.

resource.name: Example: Patient to Insurer Eligibility Check Bundle
resource.description: An example bundle representing a patient-initiated eligibility request to an insurer.

resource.name: NG Organization
resource.description: An organization profile representing healthcare facilities responsible for health services or other types of organizations.

resource.description: Nigeria Patient Profile

resource.name: NG Practitioner
resource.description: Profile for a Nigerian Practitioner

resource.name: NG PractitionerRole
resource.description: A profile for defining the role of a practitioner within a claims-processing organization.

resource.name: NG Procedure
resource.description: A profile for clinical procedures tied to a submitted claim.

resource.name: NG-Claim
resource.description: A profile representing submitted claims from providers to payers.

resource.name: NG-Claim Coverage
resource.description: A profile capturing a patient's insurance coverage details.

resource.name: NG-Claim Encounter
resource.description: A profile representing patient encounters related to claims.

resource.name: NG-Claim Invoice
resource.description: A profile for invoices generated by providers for reimbursement.

resource.name: NG-Claim Observation
resource.description: A profile representing clinical or diagnostic findings used in claims.

resource.name: NG-Claim Task
resource.description: A profile for workflow and task management in insurance processing.

resource.name: NG-ClaimResponse
resource.description: A profile representing responses from insurers regarding submitted claims.

resource.name: NG-CoverageEligibilityRequest
resource.description: A profile for checking patient's eligibility for insurance services.

resource.name: NG-CoverageEligibilityResponse
resource.description: A profile for the insurerâ€™s response to an eligibility check.

resource.name: NG-ExplanationOfBenefit
resource.description: A profile detailing adjudicated claim results.

resource.name: NG-Imm Administrative Wards CS
resource.description: This CodeSystem defines ward codes and names mapped to their respective Local Government Areas (LGAs) in Nigeria.

resource.name: NG-Imm Facility Type CS
resource.description: A standardized classification system used to describe the type or level of health facility within a healthcare delivery system, based on the scope of services provided, staffing, infrastructure, and administrative role.

resource.name: NG-Imm Gender CS
resource.description: The administrative gender of a person.

resource.name: NG-Imm Gender or Sex VS
resource.description: Subset of HL7 administrative-gender limited to 'male' and 'female'.

resource.name: NG-Imm HealthFacility Type VS
resource.description: Classification of Nigerian health facilities

resource.name: NG-Imm Languages VS
resource.description: The Patient's preferred language for communication.

resource.name: NG-Imm LGAs in Nigeria CS
resource.description: This CodeSystem defines LGA codes and names mapped to their respective States in Nigeria.

resource.name: NG-Imm LGAs VS
resource.description: The administrative Local Government Areas where a person or a facility is.

resource.name: NG-Imm Location Owner
resource.description: The owner of an Immunization location

resource.name: NG-Imm Location Owner CS
resource.description: This CodeSystem defines Immunization Location Owner.

resource.name: NG-Imm States in Nigeria CS
resource.description: This CodeSystem defines ward codes and names mapped to their respective States in Nigeria.

resource.name: NG-Imm States VS
resource.description: The state where a person or a facility is.

resource.name: NG-Imm Wards VS
resource.description: The administrative Ward (within an LGA) where a person or a facility is.
